term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - temperature coefficient of responsivity
term.title: temperature coefficient

item.text: The dependence of a detector on temperature can be described by the temperature coefficient of responsivity and is expressed as percentage change in output per K. In the case of a nonlinear dependence the temperature and the temperature range should also be stated for which the stated temperature coefficient of responsivity is applicable.
